DOC.brief_summary: A randomised , double-blind , placebo-controlled , 4-period incomplete block crossover study single oral dose GSK835726 ( 100mg , 50mg , 10mg ) , Cetirizine ( 10mg ) placebo evaluate efficacy safety use Environmental challenge chamber male subject seasonal allergic rhinitis
DOC.brief_title: Allergen Challenge Chamber Study With Single Dose Oral GSK835726 Compared With Placebo
